ZaniBet is a free football prediction game, which claims to offer real cash and gift for faultless predictions.

Replay this ticket now for increase your chance for win the jackpot.
Bravo\nYour grid has been validated.\nWe wish you good luck for win the jackpot !

ZaniBet is a game reserved for adult of 18 years and more.

Match Day Game Ticket

1 - Every week, multiple game tickets corresponding to a football league, is open for players. The goal of the game is to predict the good a result for a series of fixtures in a ticket.

2 - Validity of the predictions played on matches are based on full time and doesn\'t take care of extra time or free kick. If a match is postponed or abandoned, the bet is assumed as a given.
If a fixture or more is canceled in a game ticket : the jackpot is aborted, and all play grids are rewarded only in ZaniCoins.

3 - For validate a grid you must select a bet for each fixture.
1 = home win
N = draw
2 = visitor win

4 - Your grid will be proceed once you watch the ads video until the end.

5 - The \"Flash\" button, fill all the grid with random predictions.

6 - The \"Clear\" button, reset all predictions in a grid.

7 - Players who make clear round for all predictions in a grid, share the jackpot. If a player proceed more than one jackpot grid for a ticket, he earn a larger part of the jackpot.

8 - All gains are paid with PayPal within 30 days. Be sure to complete correctly your payment information in the profile section.

9 - Even if a grid is not clear round, each good bet yield fidelity points (ZaniCoin). This points can be exchanged later in the shop for cash.
Some fixtures in this grid is not ended yet.
Bravo, this grid is without fault !
The results for the fixtures of the Matchday %1$d is available.
You\'ve fill %1$d predictions grids for the Matchday %2$d of the %3$s. The result of your grids will be available at %4$s UTC
Up to %1$d€ of rewards for a faultless grid.

You successfully complete %1$d predictions of %2$d in this grid.

Everyday between 1AM and 2AM, ZaniBet give you free gaming chips (if your balance is under %1$d chips). With those chips you\'ll be able to predict the fixtures of the day and take your chance for earns ZaniCoins.

You can modify / delete your personal information at any time from your profile. Every day make your prognosis for accumulate ZaniCoins and get a chance to earn a part of the jackpot.
Good luck !

You receive %2$d ZaniCoins for each friends which play a grid for « MULTI » game ticket.

The goal of the game is to predict the good result of various events which could occur in the match. For each good prediction you earn ZaniCoins.

Played grids are validated and rewarded after an average of one hour after the end of the match.

ZaniBet is a game reserved for adult of 18 years and more.

Match Day Game Ticket

1 - Every week, multiple game tickets corresponding to a football league, is open for players. The goal of the game is to predict the good a result for a series of fixtures in a ticket.

2 - Validity of the predictions played on matches are based on full time and doesn\'t take care of extra time or free kick. If a match is postponed or abandoned, the bet is assumed as a given.
If a fixture or more is canceled in a game ticket : the jackpot is aborted, and all play grids are rewarded only in ZaniCoins.

3 - For validate a grid you must select a bet for each fixture.
1 = home win
N = draw
2 = visitor win

4 - Your grid will be proceed once you watch the ads video until the end.

5 - The \"Flash\" button, fill all the grid with random predictions.

6 - The \"Clear\" button, reset all predictions in a grid.

7 - Players who make clear round for all predictions in a grid, share the jackpot. If a player proceed more than one jackpot grid for a ticket, he earn a larger part of the jackpot.

8 - All gains are paid with PayPal within 30 days.

Join the ZaniBet Analytics program to receive daily ZaniHashs!
%1$d ZaniHash to participate in the tournament.
Up to several thousand ZaniCoins to share among the winners of the tournament.
The pot will be divided equally between %1$d players according to the ranking.
The pot is currently rising at %1$d ZaniCoins (this increases each time a grid is validated).
You have not played any tournament for the moment.

Tournament

Every week players from the ZaniBet community can compete by taking part in different tournaments. For each "TOURNOI" ticket, the player must give his 1N2 prognosis for a series of matches. A good prognosis made for a match earns points to rank the players in a ranking.

The goal of the game is to get as many points as possible, in order to be ranked well enough to receive a part of the kitty.

How the kitty works:

Each tournament has an initial kitty of N ZaniCoins, which will be shared equally among the players at the top of the ranking . Each time a player validates a grid, the prize pool of the tournament increases. To validate his grid and take part in the tournament, the player must have enough ZaniHash.

The value of the pot depends on the number of participants and the ZaniHash entry bet.

Once the scores of all the tournament matches are available, the scores are calculated and the winners share the prize pool.

For each tournament between 20% and 30% of the top ranked players are rewarded. multi-player equality case, the grid validation date determines the ranking.

Distribution example:

2000 players participate in tournament # 20 and the final prize pool is 20,000 ZaniCoins.
At the end of the tournament between if the distribution percentage is 20%, 400 players win 50 ZaniCoins.

Your grid has been validated and your participation in the tournament %1$s confirmed.
The result of the tournament is planned for the %2$s. If a match is postponed, the date of the results will be shifted. Do not hesitate to invite your friends to participate in the tournament to increase the pot and the number of rewarded players.
Are you sure you want to spend %1$d ZaniHashs to participate in the %2$s tournament? Once your grid is validated, it will no longer be alterable.
There are no tournaments available at the moment. Come back later to try your luck!

The ZaniAnalytics (Beta) program allows you to contribute to the economic value of ZaniBet, thanks to BlockChain technology. By participating in the ZaniAnalytics program, you have the opportunity to accumulate ZaniHash daily by allowing our algorithms to solve mathematical problems.
Exemple : your phone solves the problem 10 + 20, you receive 1 ZaniHash.

How does ZaniAnalytics work?

When you launch ZaniAnalytics, our application performs mathematical calculations, allowing you to accumulate ZaniHash. A good internet connection is required to perform these operations.

How many ZaniHash can you earn every second?

To know how many ZaniHash you can generate every second, just run ZaniAnalytics and wait a few seconds seconds to have the data in real time. The number of ZaniHash generated per day depends on several factors including:
- The power of your phone
- The state of charge of your phone
- If you use multiple devices (phones, tablet, web …) )

How do I know how many ZaniHash I won?

Your ZaniHash balance is updated every 15 to 60 minutes once ZaniAnalytics is launched.

How to win more ZaniHash?

The number of ZaniHash you generate per second depends on the speed of your phone.You can connect to your ZaniBet account from multiple devices (phones, tablets, web) and activate ZaniAnalytics to multiply by N the number of ZaniHash you earn every second.

You can use ZaniAnalytics on the browser (Chrome, Firefox) of your computer and take advantage of the computing power of it to earn up to 40 times more ZaniHash per second.

ZaniAnalytics Web is accessible at https://analytics.zanibet.com

If you want to accumulate up to 40 times more ZaniHashs per second, you can use ZaniAnalytics Web on your computer!
You can try the beta by going to the address :
https://analytics.zanibet.com
From a Google Chrome browser preference.

Once authenticated with your email address (the same as that of your ZaniBet account), your computer will start collecting ZaniHashs that will be credited directly to your ZaniBet account.

ZaniAnalytics est compatible avec votre téléphone. Vous pouvez commencer à accumuler des ZaniHash dès maintenant en activant ZaniAnalytics !

Votre production de ZaniHash est estimé à %1$d ZaniHash/s - %2$d ZaniHash/jour.
ZaniAnalytics n’est pas encore compatible avec la version 8+ d’Android.
Can not verify ZaniAnalytics compatibility with your phone. Please check that you have a stable internet connection.
We check the compatibility of your phone with ZaniAnalytics. This process takes about 40 seconds.
You must first check the compatibility of your phone before you can activate ZaniAnalytics.
This tournament is still in progress! The prize pool currently stands at %1$d ZaniCoins and the results are scheduled for %2$s.
This tournament is over with a pot of %1$d ZaniCoins! You can check your ranking and any rewards you have won.

ZaniAnalytics automatically shuts down as soon as your phone / tablet screen turns off.

If you want to activate ZaniAnalytics for a long time you have to plug in your charger. When ZaniAnalytics is started and your charger is plugged in, you can leave your screen off.

So that ZaniBet can work even when your screen is off on Android 6 and above : you need to disable battery optimization (Doze mode) from your phone settings.

ZaniAnalytics does not cause a negative charge. This ensures uninterrupted operation for months, even on low-end phones!

Your ZaniHashs are credited to your account every 10 to 60 minutes. We recommend you harvest at least 10000 ZaniHashs for your session to be considered valid (anti-fraud).
Stated from %1$d participants, %2$d ZaniCoins will be added in the pot.

You can use the web version of ZaniAnalytics (https://analytics.zanibet.com) to accumulate a maximum of ZaniHashs, which you can later exchange in the shop for chips!

The use of multi-account, cheat attempts, as well as any operations to influence the results of the grids played for one, ticket is PROHIBITED. ZaniBet is a personal game. The constitution of groups of amplitudes and coordinated to validate different results is considered as unfair. Offenders are subject to suspension of their account without notice.

A video problem? Please check that :
- you use an official version of ZaniBet, download directly and only from the Play Store.
- you do not use a VPN or a proxy. This is contrary to our terms of use.
- that you have a quality and private internet connection.
- your phone is charged.
- your phone is not rooted and has an up-to-date version of the Play Store and Google Play Service.
Your account information has been updated.
Be careful, your username can be changed only once !
You can not change your username anymore.
Are you sure you want to make these changes? In the event that you change your username for the first time, this action will no longer be possible after confirmation.

Are you sure you want to delete your ZaniBet account? ? This operation is irreversible ! Your account will be deactivated immediately, your scheduled grids and payments will be canceled and you will not be able to use the current email address / facebook account to register a new account. All your personal data will be completely deleted once the legal deadline has expired.
Yes, I want to disable my account.
By refusing to accept the conditions of our partner MoPub, this drastically reduces the number of videos available to validate your tickets.

With our partner Pollfish, you have the opportunity to receive a lot of chips by responding regularly to different polls. The first survey that will be proposed to you will not necessarily have a reward (0 chips), but will allow us to know a little more about you. You must answer this preliminary survey with honesty! Otherwise, no other survey will be offered.
